entry.value: import com.dataflowdeveloper.example.Example println("Before run") val job = new Example() job.run(spark) println("After run")

processors.name: Flat Store to Hadoop as ORC Hive Table

entry.value: SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE CAST(voltage AS FLOAT) > 95
SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE CAST(voltage AS FLOAT) > 150.0 LIMIT 1
SELECT state, (id * 2) as id, appId, driverLogUrl, sparkUiUrl FROM FLOWFILE WHERE state = 'running'

variable.name: SparkWriteApplication
variable.value: import org.apache.spark.{SparkConf, SparkContext} val config = new SparkConf().setMaster("spark://spark-master:7077").setAppName("SparkWriteApplication") val numbersRdd = sc.parallelize((1 to 10000).toList) val tot = numbersRdd.count() print(tot)
